title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.31 - Terms and conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.31 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations
(a) Generally, assistance for commercial area development financing projects for
eligible uses described in section
4243.29
(a)(1)
of
this Part will not be less than $75,000 and shall generally not exceed 30
percent of total project costs or $1,000,000, whichever is less. (b) Generally, assistance for commercial area
development financing projects for eligible uses described in section
4243.29
(a)(2) and
(3)
of this Part will not be less than
$25,000 and shall generally not exceed 50 percent of total project costs or
$1,000,000, whichever is less. (c) The foregoing terms and conditions are in addition to the applicable general
terms and conditions set forth in section
4243.4
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
